Name: crop_sensitive()
Output: A data frame with crop sensitive indices with n columns depending on the number of thresholds passed to each index

Name: GDD()
Output: Either the cumulative sum of gdd across time (the default), or the gdd obtained in each day, or the number of days required to reach a certain amount of gdd

Name: late_frost()
Function: Compute the occurrence of late-spring frost
Output: A data.frame with the duration and gdd accumulated during the events of frost, latency (where there is no frost event, but also there is no gdd), and warming (where gdd is accumulated)

Name: rainfall()
Output: Either the indices considering the series as a whole, or time series indices splitted into equal intervals of days

Name: temperature()
Output: Either the indices considering the series as a whole, or time series indices splitted into equal intervals of days
